title: U.S. per capita consumption of dried fruit 2000 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Per capita consumption in pounds. In total the number of data points it has is 19.
In general Per capita consumption in pounds has fallen over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2017/18 and 2018/19.
Maximum Per capita consumption in pounds, about 2.59 was reported at Year 2002/03
Minimum Per capita consumption in pounds about 1.0 was reached at Year 2018/19
